info.name: Fallen London - Opportunity Protector
info.description: Opportunity Protector prevents you from accidentally discarding an important opportunity card, whether it's An Unsigned Message, Give a Gift, or anything you want (with a little customization).

style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://fallenlondon.storynexus.com/") {
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=10133', {cb: 1})"], /* Docks (Parabolan Panthers) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=10135', {cb: 1})"], /* Bohemians (Parabolan Panthers) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=10153', {cb: 1})"], /* Society (Parabolan Panthers / Mirrorcatch Boxes) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=10800', {cb: 1})"], /* The Tower of Sun and Moon: a Reservation at the Royal Bethlehem Hotel */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=10802', {cb: 1})"], /* The Lofty Tower: The Potential of Premises at the Bazaar */

div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=11338', {cb: 1})"], /* A Voice from a Well (Appalling Secret; rare) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=11529', {cb: 1})"], /* Call In Favours in the Flit */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=13353', {cb: 1})"], /* A dream about a window at night */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=13368', {cb: 1})"], /* A Little Omen (mood) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=13373', {cb: 1})"], /* A Dusty Bookshop (mood) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=14881', {cb: 1})"], /* A Contact in the Great Game has a Tale for you */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=15360', {cb: 1})"], /* Disgraceful Spectacle (Jack Vance memorial) */

div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=18161', {cb: 1})"], /* A Commotion Above! (Gems, wines, or phosphorent scarabs; rare) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=18162', {cb: 1})"], /* A Flash of White (Salt Weasel) */

div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=18167', {cb: 1})"], /* The Battle Hymn of the Drownies (50CP to Dangerous) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=18168', {cb: 1})"], /* The Skin of the Bazaar (Scholar of the Correspondence actions) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=21762', {cb: 1})"], /* A Visit */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=22278', {cb: 1})"], /* The Soft-Hearted Widow */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=22408', {cb: 1})"], /* The Neath's Mysteries (High-EPA social actions) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=99374', {cb: 1})"], /* An Unsigned Message (increasing stats past 200) */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=99967', {cb: 1})"], /* A Visit from Slowcake's Amanuensis */
div#opportunitiesSection > div#deckDrawSection.clearfix > ul[class^="hand-size"] > li > input.discard_btn[onclick="$('#opportunitiesSection').load('/Storylet/DiscardSometimesCard?eventid=122163', {cb: 1})"] /* A Dream of Blood (rare card, and yes, it's six digits) */

    display: none;
}  
}
